channel.title: fuzhong-li on Dan Kleiman
channel.description: Recent content in fuzhong-li on Dan Kleiman

item.title: Obviously Tai Chi Improves Balance, But How Do You Explain It?
item.description: We often talk about the way Tai Chi can improve your physical health and mental and emotional well-being from the point of view of the practitioner. But not everyone out there is as familiar with practical ways to use Tai Chi to support their health and wellness goals as you may be. Later this year, I'm thrilled to have the chance to share Tai Chi with physicians in a course at Harvard Medical School.

item.title: YouTube AudioSwap
item.description:
I've been working on this video, documenting an instructor training we recently hosted at Brookline Tai Chi:
Our director, Perry, selected music, but YouTube came back saying it was copyright infringement to use that track. Ok...so it gave me an alternative called AudioSwap. This is unbelievable. Basically, YouTube has a soundtrack generation engine, that you can browse by genre and artist and even filter per the length of your video.
